title: Brambleton Says Yes: A Friendship Story for Kids
itunes:author: Rhea Pechter
itunes:summary:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting [THIS LINK](https://amzn.to/3RRovO5). I hope you LOVE IT!
The first LSFTP PICTURE BOOK is on its way! Take a moment to sign up for the email newsletter on www.littlestoriestinypeople.com for updates and to have your child’s name included in the special illustration in the back of the book (yay)!!
Brambleton Says Yes is a children’s story about a little beetle who learns to be more open to new experiences, but not until after he learns something about himself. Themes include friendship and self-acceptance.
Make sure you are subscribed to the podcast so you never miss an episode! And please show your support by leaving a rating/review on Apple Podcasts or wherever you listen to the show. Those reviews really help the stories reach more families and makes the podcast more visible in search results.
I love to hear from my fans! You can email me at rhea@littlestoriestinypeople.com, find the page on Facebook, or on Instagram @littlestoriestinypeople. Please take a moment to share LSFTP with a friends, your local parents organization, or your favorite Facebook community!
Thank you to my middle child for providing duck sounds. Stay tuned after the episode for some extra silliness.
